title: Embedded Firmware / Hardware Engineer
full_description: Position Summary:The FW / HW Engineer for Encoders will join a multidisciplinary team that is designing and developing of components and subsystems for encoder products. This person is involved with all aspects of the development cycle – conceptual design, design (analog, digital, embedded firmware, schematics, board layout) analysis, overseeing hardware, defining and executing qualification and testing plans as well as project management. Successful candidates will work in a team environment with opportunities to acquire increasing levels of responsibility.Essential Job Functions· Designing, maintaining, implementing, or improving electrical design for various product lines.· Programming of microcontrollers or FPGA’s to collect data from various sensors via any manner of serial / parallel communication protocols· Determine hardware and system requirements for embedded systems applied to encoders and sensors.· Conferring with customers, engineers, and others to discuss existing or potential engineering products or projects.· Ensuring that installation and operations conform to standards and customer requirements by preparing electrical systems specifications, test plans and technical drawings.· Establishing manufacturing or installation standards or specifications by performing a wide range of detailed calculations.· Ensuring compliance with specifications, codes, documentation, support or testing activities.· Writing reports and compiling data regarding existing and potential electrical engineering projects and studies.· Supervising or training project team members.· Estimating material, labor, or construction costs for budget preparation.· Working with a variety of technicians.Education/License Requirements· BS or MS degree in Electrical Engineering or related field from an accredited school.Experience Requirements7 - 10 years of new product development experience and PCB designDesign and development of electronic hardware and firmware applicationsExperience with schematic design, component selection, PCB layout, prototyping and testing.Knowledge of applicable UL and EN/IEC codes and standards.Proficient in design and calculation software.Competencies· Ability to think creatively - develop, design, or create new applications, ideas, relationships, systems, or products· Attention to engineering detail required· Goal oriented self-driver with strong work ethic· Professional presence· Innovative, creative person· Team player able to operative effectively across all boundaries of organizational structure (sales, marketing, engineering, drafting, purchasing and manufacturing)· Excellent communication skills· Working knowledge of Microsoft Office products
